name: chartsAPI
description: Get historical chart data for token pairs. Supports both line charts and candle charts for various time periods.

type.description: Type of chart data to retrieve. 'line' for simple price line charts, 'candle' for OHLC candlestick charts.

token0.description: Base token address (the token being priced)

token1.description: Quote token address (the token used for pricing, usually a stablecoin like USDC)

period.description: Time period for line charts. Required when type is 'line'.

seconds.description: Time period in seconds for candle charts. Required when type is 'candle'. 300=5min, 900=15min, 3600=1hour, 14400=4hours, 86400=1day, 604800=1week

chainId.description: Chain ID where the tokens exist. 1=Ethereum, 56=BNB Chain, 137=Polygon, 42161=Arbitrum, 43114=Avalanche, 100=Gnosis, 10=Optimism, 8453=Base, 324=zkSync Era, 59144=Linea, 146=Arbitrum Nova, 130=Metis
